name: Clap! Clap! Protect!
description:
Clap! Clap! Protect!

The party just got ruined! The ball has fallen! Your job now is to help the others escape by clapping.

Instructions:

  • Click on the screen to send clapping waves! 
  • Keep the Big Ball from hitting others!
  • Score by allowing dancers to pass by and striking the Big Ball!

Helpful:

  • The cyan laser on the screen is a warning of where the next dancer will come from.

Note: The Big Ball is actually a disco ball.
